body_html:
I was just told that the rest of the tests will stop if the sanity check fails, which failed because of this following buildifier error (see below) So if you fix that, things should progress...

=== Sanity check step 3 of 7: do_buildifier (buildifier check) ===

Running do_buildifier on 179 files

tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD # reformat

buildifier took 1 s

FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
694,698c694,697
< "transpose_op.cc"
< ]
< + if_mkl([
< "mkl_transpose_op.cc"
< ]),

    "transpose_op.cc",
] + if_mkl([
    "mkl_transpose_op.cc",
]),

700,703c699,701
< deps = ARRAY_DEPS
< + if_mkl([
< "//third_party/mkl:intel_binary_blob",
< ]),

deps = ARRAY_DEPS + if_mkl([
    "//third_party/mkl:intel_binary_blob",
]),

Please fix manually or run buildifier to auto-fix.

body:
I was just told that the rest of the tests will stop if the sanity check fails, which failed because of this following buildifier error (see below) So if you fix that, things should progress...

=== Sanity check step 3 of 7: do_buildifier (buildifier check) ===

Running do_buildifier on 179 files

tensorflow/core/kernels/BUILD # reformat 

buildifier took 1 s

FAIL: buildifier found errors and/or warnings in above BUILD files.
buildifier suggested the following changes:
694,698c694,697
<         "transpose_op.cc"
<         ]
<         + if_mkl([
<         "mkl_transpose_op.cc"
<         ]),
---
>         "transpose_op.cc",
>     ] + if_mkl([
>         "mkl_transpose_op.cc",
>     ]),
700,703c699,701
<     deps = ARRAY_DEPS
<         + if_mkl([
<                 "//third_party/mkl:intel_binary_blob",
<         ]),
---
>     deps = ARRAY_DEPS + if_mkl([
>         "//third_party/mkl:intel_binary_blob",
>     ]),
Please fix manually or run buildifier <file> to auto-fix.
